short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy case number and case title automatically

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PCT - Papirfly Chrome Tools. Automatically get case number and case title from Jira or Fogbugz copied to your clipboard. This extension is for Papirfly developers.
